short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for checking DNS records with some useful tips.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for a quick and accurate way to perform DNS lookups on your mobile device? DNS Info is here to help! Our easy-to-use extension gives you instant access to detailed DNS information, helping you troubleshoot network issues, verify website security, and understand how your domain is performing.

Key Features:

📡 Instant DNS Lookup
Perform DNS queries for any domain and get real-time results. We support various record types, including A, AAAA, MX, NS, SOA, DMARC, SPF, PTR, and TXT.

📝 Detailed DNS Records
View detailed information about your domain’s DNS setup, including its IP address, mail server, and more.

🔗 Shareable Records
Generate a unique link for any checked record, which includes details like the IP address and the time the record was checked. Share it with others for easy access.

🔍 Reverse DNS Lookup
Find out the domain name associated with an IP address to help with network diagnostics and security checks.

🔐 Check Website Security
Get a better understanding of a domain's security with DNSSEC and SPF information.

🌍 DNS Propagation Check
See if DNS changes have propagated across the world and make sure your updates are live.

🖥️ User-Friendly Interface
Our extension features an intuitive design, making it easy for both beginners and advanced users to get the DNS information they need.

⚡ Fast Results
Perform queries quickly and accurately with minimal loading times, allowing you to get your answers in seconds.

Who Can Benefit from DNS Info?

👨‍💻 Web Developers
Easily check the status of domains and servers.

🖥️ System Administrators
Verify DNS settings and troubleshoot network issues.

🔧 IT Professionals
Use advanced features like reverse lookups and DNSSEC checking for network security.

🌐 General Users
Understand DNS records and improve your browsing experience with fast and reliable results.

Why Choose DNS Info?

✔️ Accuracy
Get the most accurate DNS data possible, sourced from trusted servers.

🔒 Security
Stay informed about website security and DNS configurations.

📲 Convenience
Access detailed DNS information anytime, anywhere, right from your mobile device.

With DNS Info, you can ensure your domain is properly configured, troubleshoot any DNS-related issues, and gain insight into how your network is performing. Download now and start exploring DNS like never before!
